詛字的基本解释

詛
zǔ
见“诅”。

詛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǔ］
［《廣韻》莊助切，去御，莊。］
［《集韻》壯所切，上語，莊。］
亦作“謯1”。“诅1”的繁体字。“作4”的被通假字。
(1)诅咒；咒骂。
(2)盟誓。
(3)祈祷。

詛字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1156第03
〔古文〕?謯【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莊助切，阻去聲。【說文】詶也。【廣韻】咒詛。【書·無逸】厥口詛、祝。【疏】詛祝，謂吿神明，令加殃咎也。以言吿神謂之祝。請神加殃謂之詛。【詩·小雅】出此三物，以詛爾斯。【釋文】以禍福之言相要曰詛。【周禮·春官】詛祝掌盟詛之祝號。【註】詛，謂祝之使沮敗也。大事曰盟，小事曰詛。【疏】盟盟將來，詛詛過往。【後漢·仲長統傳】匈詈腹詛。　又【集韻】古通作。【詩·大雅】侯作侯祝。【釋文】作，本或作詛。【朱傳】作，讀爲詛。詛祝，怨謗也。　又【集韻】遵遇切，娵去聲。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?壯所切，音阻。【集韻】呪也。【釋名】阻也。使人行事阻限于言也。　又通作阻。【晉語】狂夫阻之衣也。【註】狂夫，方相氏之士也。阻古通詛。將服是衣，必先詛之。

考證：〔【詩·大雅】侯作侯祝。【釋文】作，本或作詛。【傳】作，讀爲詛。〕　謹照原書傳字上增朱字。

curse
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zǔ]
["Guangyun" Zhuang helps cut, go to imperial, Zhuang. ]
["Ji Yun" cut by Zhuang, Shangyu, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "謯1". Traditional Chinese characters for "curse 1". The word "made 4" was passed falsely.
(1) Curse; curse.
(2) The pledge.
(3) Pray.
curse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　Cusu; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 1156 No. 03
〔古文〕? 謯 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Zhuang helps cut, blocking the sound. [Said Wen] Shi Ye. [Guang Yun] Curse. [Book·Wu Yi] Juekou curse, wish. 【Shu】Chuzhu, that is to say that the gods are guilty, and the blame is also added. It is a blessing to speak to the gods. Please God add the curse of that. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】These three things come out as a curse. 【Explanation】To curse with words of misfortune and blessing. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan】Chu Zhu Zhang Meng Chu Zhu Zhi Zhu. [Note] Curse means that Zhu Zhi is also defeated. Big things are called alliances, and small things are called curses. 【Sparse】Mengmeng will curse the past in the future. [Later Han·Zhong Chang Tong Biography] Hungarian cursed abdomen.　[Jiyun] Gutong made. [Poetry·Daya] Hou Zuo Hou Zhu. 【Explanation】To make, or make a curse. [Zhu Chuan] written, read as a curse. Curse, complain and slander.　[Jiyun] Zun Yuqi, 娵Que. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Zhuang cut, sound resistance. [Ji Yun] Gu Ya. [Release name] Resistance also. Make people's actions limited to words.　It is blocked again. [Jin language] The madman's clothing is also for resistance. [Note] A madman, a fellow of Fang Xiang's family. Stop the ancient Tong curse. The clothes are clothes, and they must be cursed first. Textual research: [[Poetry·Daya] Hou Zuo Hou Zhu. 【Explanation】To make, or make a curse. [Biography] written, read as a curse. 〕　I would like to add the Zhu word to the original book.
